metadata.title: CVE-2022-45886 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.9.drivers/media/dvb-core/dvb_net.c has a .disconnect versus dvb_device_openrace condition that leads to a use-after-free.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
